uiInfo.label: MySQL Binary Log Change Data Capture
Extract Mutated Data and Set Operation Type

configuration.name: query
configuration.value:
select r.rating, m.uuid as movie_uuid, u.uuid as user_uuid from ratings r 
	inner join _movie_uuid m on r.movie_id = m.movie_id 
	inner join _user_uuid u on r.user_id = u.user_id
    where r.user_id = ${record:value('/user_id')}

configuration.name: query
configuration.value:
select t.tag, m.uuid as movie_uuid, u.uuid as user_uuid from tags t 
	inner join _movie_uuid m on t.movie_id = m.movie_id
    inner join _user_uuid u on t.user_id = u.user_id
    where t.user_id = ${record:value('/user_id')}
